headline.main: GIBSON DISPUTES WHEELER CHARGE; Allied Aid Head Replies to Talk of Banker Backers by Citing Actual List on File NOTES NO RECIPROCATION Vermonter Challenges Senator on 'Appeasers, Bundists, Communists' Behind Him

lead_paragraph: BRATTLEBORO, Vt., March 2 -- Former Senator Ernest W. Gibson Jr., national chairman of the Committee to Defend America by Aiding the Allies, here at his home town to preside as Moderator of the Town Meeting on Tuesday, today accused Senator Wheeler of making an unfounded charge that his committee is the tool of international bankers.
abstract: link with Brit Fascists and Nazi propaganda charged by E W Gibson
